name: Hold the Light
description:
The darkness is closing in, don't let it take the light.

Use your wits, skills and fireballs to survive increasing waves of enemies. Just killing enemies won't get you anywhere though. Collect light tokens and bring them back to the light (don't forget to hold E) to level up, increasing your speed, damage and cooldowns. The light is fragile though, so if enemies get near it, they'll destroy it quickly! Each time you level up the light, you get access to a perk. Choose wisely.

Controls:

Spacebar - Jump

Left Mouse - Aim

Right Mouse (while aiming) - Shoot Fireball

Right Mouse (not aiming) - Punch

E (While near the center) - Deposit Light

Shift - Dash
